# IntentChoiceOption.Style

**Structure**

Defines the visual style and semantic meaning of an [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/IntentChoiceOption].

## Declaration

```swift
struct Style
```

## Overview

The system uses the style to render the option appropriately in the user interface.

## Type Properties

- **cancel**: Apply a style that indicates the option cancels the operation and leaves things unchanged.
- **default**: Apply the default style to the option’s button.
- **destructive**: Apply a style that indicates the option might change or delete data.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
